com.datamelt.rules.core

Class Parameter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.datamelt.rules.core.Parameter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Parameter
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    represents a class used to store parameters that will be passed to a method using reflection.
    Author:
    uwe geercken
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Parameter(java.lang.String type, java.lang.String value)
      constructor for creating a parameter. expects the type of the parameter and the value
      Parameter(java.lang.String type, java.lang.String value, boolean isSetterValue)
      constructor for creating a parameter. expects the type of the parameter, the value and an indicator if it is a setter value

        public Parameter(java.lang.String type,
                 java.lang.String value)
          throws org.xml.sax.SAXException
        constructor for creating a parameter. expects the type of the parameter and the value
        Parameters:
        type - the type of the parameter
        value - the value of the parameter
        Throws:
        org.xml.sax.SAXException - exception if the type of the parameter is undefined

      • Parameter

        public Parameter(java.lang.String type,
                 java.lang.String value,
                 boolean isSetterValue)
        constructor for creating a parameter. expects the type of the parameter, the value and an indicator if it is a setter value
        Parameters:
        type - the type of the parameter
        value - the value of the parameter
        isSetterValue - indicator if the parameter is belonging to a setter method
